response: You wake up in a mysterious forest. Do you go 'left' or 'right'?
You find an old abandoned house. Do you 'enter' or 'ignore'?
You reach a river with a broken bridge. Do you 'swim' or 'turn back'?
Inside the house, you see a staircase and a dark basement. Do you go 'up' or 'down'?
You continue walking and find a cave. Do you 'enter' or 'walk past'?
You start swimming but see something moving underwater. Do you 'keep going' or 'return'?
You return and see a hidden trail. Do you 'follow' it or 'rest'?
Upstairs, you find a dusty old book. Do you 'read' or 'ignore'?
You descend into the basement and hear a noise. Do you 'hide' or 'investigate'?
You keep walking and find an abandoned well. Do you 'look inside' or 'walk away'?
You swim further and find an island. Do you 'explore' or 'build a raft'?
You turn back but notice a hidden cave entrance. Do you 'enter' or 'ignore'?
The trail leads to a village. Do you 'talk to people' or 'keep walking'?
You take a rest and wake up to find a note beside you. Do you 'read it' or 'ignore it'?
The book contains a treasure map! You win! 🎉
You hide in the basement and find a secret tunnel leading outside. You escape safely!
You find a magical artifact, but it's cursed! Game over. 💀
You find a hidden key inside the well. It opens a secret door in the house!
You ignore the well and keep moving forward, reaching a village.
The island has a hidden temple with ancient secrets. You become famous!
You build a raft and escape the island safely!
The villagers help you find your way home. You win! 🏡
You get lost in the jungle and never return. Game over. 💀
The note reveals a hidden treasure nearby. You dig and find gold! 🎉
You ignore the note and walk away, missing your chance for treasure.
You enter the house and find a locked door. Do you 'use the key' or 'search for another way'?
The key unlocks the door, revealing a treasure room! You win! 🎉
You find a hidden passage behind a bookshelf. Do you 'enter' or 'ignore' it?
The passage leads to a dark dungeon. Do you 'explore' or 'turn back'?
You find a chest filled with gold and jewels! You win! 🎉
You return to the house and find the door locked again. Game over. 💀
You ignore the passage and leave the house. You find nothing. Game over. 💀
